subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.managePlans: Manage your subscription plans and billing
subscriptions.needActiveSubscription: You need an active subscription to use this site. Choose a plan below to get started.
subscriptions.automaticRenewalDesc: Your subscription automatically renews at the end of each billing period and grants you unlimited access to the Psychic Oracle. You can cancel anytime by unchecking the checkbox below. Your subscription will continue until the end of the current period, then stop.
subscriptions.chooseAPlan: Choose a Plan to Get Started
subscriptions.paymentMethodRequiredDesc: Please add a payment method in your billing settings before subscribing to a plan.
subscriptions.noPlanAvailable: No subscription plans available yet. Check back soon!
subscriptions.automaticRenewalInfo: Automatic Renewal: Your subscription automatically renews at the end of each billing period
subscriptions.cancelAnytime: Cancel Anytime: Uncheck the box next to your subscription to cancel
subscriptions.noInterruption: No Interruption: Your service continues until the end of your current billing period
subscriptions.planChanges: Plan Changes: When changing plans, your new subscription starts after your current period ends
subscriptions.simpleBilling: Simple Billing: All charges appear clearly on your invoices
subscriptions.monthlyDescription: Full access with renewal each month.
subscriptions.annualDescription: Full access with payments once per year
subscriptions.subscriptionReady: Your subscription is ready. Please click below to finalize and complete the setup.
subscriptions.subscriptionReadyToStart: Your subscription is ready to start. You will be charged at the end of your first billing period on
